LanguageData.VME_Aurora_Amazing.stages.0.label: amazing aurora
LanguageData.VME_Aurora_Amazing.stages.0.description: I have a moment's respite from the darkness of the night.
LanguageData.VME_Aurora_Despised.stages.0.label: disgusting aurora
LanguageData.VME_Aurora_Despised.stages.0.description: The blinding lights in the heavens give me a headache.
